attributes.action: Make 21st and 22nd June national bank holidays.
attributes.additional_details: Everyone has been through so much in the past year, we need a celebration and a time to be together again. Everyone should have the opportunity to celebrate this occasion, so a bank holiday will give as many people as possible the opportunity to.
attributes.background: Given the government’s published roadmap to lifting lockdown restrictions, the signatories of this petition call on the government to create two new national bank holidays on 21st and 22nd June 2021.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Make June 22nd (or the day after Nightclubs reopen) a bank holiday
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576510

Create a one off Bank Holiday on Monday June 21st 2021.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555205
